item.description:
Hi Everyone,

The proposed increase of 2.85% for the 2009 Strafford County budget
will likely go challenged by some county delegates and those
organizations that lost their funding. We will be communicating with
the delegation and urging them to adopt the proposed budget put forth
by the Strafford County Commission. Yes, there are going to be staff
reductions and vacant positions that will go unfilled, but as we know,
this is happening to taxpayers being asked to pay this bill too.
There will also be some non-profit groups that will no longer receive
taxpayer money, but in these difficult times, these concessions simply
needed to be made to lesson the burden on the taxpayer.

So, we urge everyone to review this information and contact the NH
State Representatives that make up the Strafford County delegation to
let them know that you support the 2009 Strafford County budget as
proposed. We also urge you to attend the the public hearing on this
budget to express your support of this budget to the County
Commissioners.

Thursday January 15, 2009 at 7 PM
Strafford County Superior Court House
259 County Farm Road
Superior Court Room #1, 2nd floor
Dover, NH

Also please visit www.rochestertaxpayers.org to view new county
information. Feel free to view and make comments in our blog area and
please participate in our current survey.

Your continued support is what makes the differnce!

Best Regards,

RCTA
item.name: Strafford County Budget: Public Hearing
